document.title: Online shopping
title: Online shopping
subtitle: Share of woman/men aged 16 to 74 who ordered goods or services online within the last year
longtitle0_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who ordered clothes and sports goods online within the last year,
longtitle0_1: in % of all woman/men the same age who ordered goods or services online within the last year)
longtitle1_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who ordered electronic equipments online within the last year,
longtitle1_1: in % of all woman/men the same age who ordered goods or services online within the last year)
longtitle2_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who ordered film/music online within the last year,
longtitle2_1: in % of all woman/men the same age who ordered goods or services online within the last year)
longtitle3_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who ordered household goods online within the last year,
longtitle3_1: in % of all woman/men the same age who ordered goods or services online within the last year)
longtitle4_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who booked travel and holiday accomodations within the last year,
longtitle4_1: in % of all woman/men the same age who ordered goods or services online within the last year)
longtitle5_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who ordered tickets for events online within the last year,
longtitle5_1: in % of all woman/men the same age who ordered goods or services online within the last year)
instructions0: Select a category to see the comparison between women and men for the EU and the Member States.
instructions1_part1: In order to sort by women or by men, rank by clicking on the arrows (
instructions1_part2: ) below the bar chart. To select data for only women or only men, uncheck/check the boxes.
dataset-header: Click on link to get to dataset
